ANNOUNCEMENT:

The message that Mr. Han Bing Siong has passed away 
is INCORRECT!

Not less tragic though, as it is his wife who is no longer 
among us.

Stefan Sebregts
The Netherlands
Member of Dutch Token Society



>Forward from Rich T's message board:
>
>-------
>I have just received an email from a Oranda Token Kai member telling
>me on the passing yesterday of Han Bing Siong. He was well known for
>his pentrating erudite scholarly works that reguarly appeared in the
>English and Japanese language sword journals like Token Bijutsu,
>JSS/US and Token Society of Great Britain.
>
>I shall never forget how he answered every query I had however
>insignificant and always had time for the younger element. He once
>wrote, 'I don't feel its a waste of time to answer any thing you
>ahve to write Yahya for you are next generation that must carry on
>what he started after the war.'
>
>RIP good friend
>
>We'll miss you.
>
>Yahya Abdelsamad ------------------
